section.title: Frontend Engineer @ Deloitte Technologie
section.text: Spearheaded the design, development, and maintenance of the user interface for 5 major projects, delivering high-quality solutions leveraging React.js and AWS, in close collaboration with the UI/UX team. Ensured that all code was meticulously structured and thoroughly documented.

section.title: Fullstack Developer @ Centric IT Solutions
section.text: Worked closely with seasoned engineers, contributing to both frontend and backend workflows using Angular.js and .NET as primary technologies, delivering robust and well-structured solutions across the stack.

section.title: Web Developer @ Duk-Tech
section.text: Maintained two WordPress websites while devising and implementing a SEO strategy, conducting in-depth research to optimize organic solutions for clients. Additionally, gained hands-on experience with the Vue.js framework while contributing to a platform in the energy sector.

section.title: UI Designer @ Fix Media Advertising
section.text: Delivered over five complete website wireframes using Adobe XD and Figma, while developing proficiency across the Adobe Suite, including Photoshop, Illustrator, XD, and Premiere Pro. Ensured that all products adhered to design principles, contemporary trends, and company guidelines.

section.title: Data Entry Operator @ Tagonsoft
section.text: Maintained data for a scholarly project promoting awareness of the Swift programming language, while gaining practical experience in mobile development through daily project support tasks.

section.title: High School Diploma - Mathematics & Computer Science
